attributes.title: 2022 Volkswagen Caddy 2.0 TDI

attributes.description: THIS IS THE MOST EXCITING PRODUCT TO HIT THE SA MARKET IN A VERY LONG TIME. In my opinion, the Chinese manufactures are now where the Koreans were 10 years ago when they launched the new generation KIA SPORTAGE and HYUNDAI IX35. The were making a good quality product at an affordable price. The Koreans are still making a good product but the price is no longer so affordable with their entry level S.U.Vs selling for over R400 000. Enter the BAIC X25. It is just such a cool S.U.V. ALL THE MODERN FEATURES AND LUXURIES INCLUDING TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINMENT WITH FULLY INTEGRATED SMART PHONE CONNECTIVITY. Just such a beautiful looking S.U.V. The lines are just gorgeous Make no mistake, the build quality and overall feel of this vehicle is also brilliant. THE 11 BILLION SPENT ON A STATE OF THE ART PRODUCTION PLANT IN P.E MEANS THAT THIS MANUFACTURER IS HERE TO STAY. The car comes with a 5 YEAR120 000 KM factory warranty which equals 100 peace of mind motoring We have a fully accredited BAIC workshop on site to cater for all your parts and maintenance needs. IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A COOLER OR BETTER VALUE BRAND NEW S.U.V AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE. must be seen and driven to be appreciated Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security
